title: "Mythic AI gets funding to mass-produce edge chips"
excerpt: "Just six months after unveiling its first AI inferencing processor, Mythic AI has announced a new round of funding for $70 million in Series C investment to begin mass production of its chips and to develop its next generation of hardware and software products."
